snippet.title: Lesson 38 - Identifying Microservices
snippet.description: One of the many difficult aspects of the microservices architecture style is identifying a microservice. What is the proper level of granularity? What factors influence the granularity of a service? In this lesson Mark Richards shows how to combine a function-driven approach, data-driven approach, and a request-based approach to achieve the right level of granularity for a microservice. Stay tuned each Monday for more lessons in Software Architecture at https://www.developertoarchitect.com/lessons/.
